entry.title: Circle of Friends
entry.summary:
Vendor: islandrose.net
Type:
Price: 2760.00

Nine Single-Stem Rose Arrangements

Everyone has that special Circle of Friends that they truly rely on day in and day out. Thank them for being in your life, making you laugh on good days, and having your back on not-so-good days.

Get 9 separate single-stem arrangements delivered to your address so you can give them personally to your circle of friends!

Absolutely no hidden fees! For your convenience, all our prices already include Service Charges, Taxes, and Delivery Fees. Happy Shopping!

*Our priority is to deliver your flowers on time! If certain flowers unexpectedly become unavailable, Island Rose will replace them with flowers of equal or greater value.
**Island Rose offers next-day delivery nationwide! Same-day delivery is available in Metro Manila.

entry.title: Heartfelt
entry.summary:
Vendor: islandrose.net
Type:
Price: 1476.00

Customized Bear with Three White Roses

We sometimes forget to say "sorry" to those we've hurt badly.  Send your deepest apologies and mend the broken relationship. Saying sorry should be this easy. Send a peace offering now!


Flowers are arranged in exclusive Island Rose packaging and delivered in special gift boxes. Special add-on gift items are available upon checkout.

Absolutely no hidden fees! For your convenience, all our prices already include Service Charges, Taxes, and Delivery fees. Happy Shopping!

*Our priority is to deliver your flowers on time! If certain flowers unexpectedly become unavailable, Island Rose will replace them with flowers of equal or greater value.

**Due to COVID-19, deliveries are limited to Metro Manila and a few provinces. Please refer to our home page and social media or email us for updates.

entry.title: Group Hug
entry.summary:
Vendor: islandrose.net
Type:
Price: 2760.00

Five Sets of Three Long Stem Roses

Do you have a lot of love to give? Here is teh perfect deal to save the day! Get five sets of 3 stem roses bouquets delivered to your address so you can give them personally to your family, friends, and colleagues!

Flowers are arranged and shipped in exclusive Island Rose packaging. Vase is not included. Special add-on gift items are available upon checkout.

Absolutely no hidden fees! For your convenience, all our prices already include Service Charges, Taxes, and Delivery Fees. Happy Shopping!
